title: KSI really wants to fight Jake Paul and 'break his face' in the ring
text:
KSI believes he will KO Logan Paul in round 5 of boxing match (Picture: Getty – ITV)

KSI and Logan Paul will be fighting in the ring for the second time next month but KSI has further plans for the younger Paul.

The YouTuber plans to not only destroy Logan in the ring but also wants to fight Jake Paul and ‘break his face’.

We guess he wants to cross off the entire Paul family off his list.

Speaking exclusively to TMZ, KSI said: ‘I want to fight Jake Paul, man. I really want to break his face.’

KSI – real name Olajide William ‘JJ’ Olatunji – and Logan’s first match ended in a draw, but if there was a winner Jake would have been next in line to take the novice boxer on.

‘I would love to break Jake’s face as well as Logan’s. I personally don’t think, as soon as I knock out Logan, I don’t think he’s gonna want to fight me,’ he said.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I think he’s gonna see that and be afraid and just be like, “yo, actually, I don’t know if this whole boxing thing is for me”.’

Looks like Jake has no choice now but to train (Picture: Jake and Logan Paul YouTube)

Recently, Logan said he’s worried about getting stabbed when he comes to London for the press conference with KSI today.

After it was announced that the pair would be set to take to the UK on 7 October, the 24-year-old aired his fears on social media.

‘London see u monday. pls don’t stab me,’ he asked.

Sounds reasonable enough, to be honest.

When his best friend, Mike Majlak declared he was planning to ‘tape alllllll the phonebooks to me,’ a fan expressed fears for the pair’s safety.

Appearing to keep his chill, Logan added: ‘Y’all can stab mike just keep the acid off me.’

Is Logan aware he’s coming from a country with guns?

There’s one month left to train (Picture: Kit Oates/REX)

Despite Logan’s fears, has made it clear he’s loving the news of the UK conference after he urged his opponent not to ‘cry off the stage.’

Honestly, this whole thing is a complete mess of bad insults and we can’t wait to hear even more trash talk during this conference.

MORE: KSI ‘never been in better shape’ as Calfreezy slams Logan Paul’s claims he’s ‘lost his fire’
description: KSI has a month before he has a rematch with Logan Paul but has told TMZ that he wants to also fight Jake Paul in the boxing ring.
